Hmm.. For the record, the Alliance was made for the exact opposite reason 
Dark Prime is telling the Maximals. The Vok that possessed Zardus and ordered 
him to get the Alliance together did it to preserve history by whiping out 
all the other bots. They wern't doing that because there wasn't enough 
botpower on their side, but that's different now...

Also, Logo's a bit off on the history. Well, it isn't really if its just what 
KitKat knows, but if you stretch it out all the way to the beginning of the 
RPG.... I'm not even gonna go into that, too tired right now.

::Grimmler::

Grimmler raises an eyebrow. "Now wait a minute! The Maximals are not on bad 
terms with the Alliance. In fact, we havn't been attacked by them at the 
Cybertronian Fire at all. The Predacons are what we should be considering. If 
my mission briefing was right, the Predacons are here to gather energon, and 
if they succeed in getting it back to Cybertron, us Maximals are in alot of 
trouble. Their fleet could then overpower us very easily then. If Cybertron 
is in danger, its from the Predacons. They have a huge fleet, the Alliance 
only has about thirty bots."
